This documentation is for version 2.0.dev, which is not released yet.

lingpy.algorithm.distance.hamming

lingpy.algorithm.distance.hamming(str1, str2)

Compute the Hamming distance between two strings.

The Hamming distance (see Hamming1950 [http://lingulist.de/evobib/evobib.php?key=Hamming1950]) is defined as the number of bits that are different between two vectors.

Parameters :

str1 : str

str to be compared to str2

str2 : str

str to be compared to str1
Returns :

_ : int

the hamming distance
